name: The "So, long and thanks for all the fish" Release
body:
This release adds French and Portuguese translations, fixes Danbooru sample and full-res image URLs being the wrong way round and removes the donation pop-up dialog.

Personal note: I have decided to move the project into long-term maintenance mode. No new features will be added. Critical bugs might still get fixed, but I'd prefer if somebody forked the project and took over development. The reason for this is that I don't use Nori myself much anymore, and therefore lack the motivation to continue working on it. I want to move on to other things. 

For now, I decided not to switch the repository into read-only mode.

## Changelog ##

```
Lesquivemeau (1):
      French translation

TheKoakuma (1):
      Portuguese translation

Tomasz Jan GÃ³ralczyk (7):
      Build for Android 9 using Android Studio 3.4.2
      Disable the donation pop-up
      Fix Danbooru sample URLs
      Mark videos as prepared in inactive fragments
      Remove mentions of Patreon
      Remove Travis CI integration
      Update build SDKs and third-party dependencies
```

## Discord server

If you're interested in contributing to Nori, have any questions or just want to hang out, the [Discord server](https://discord.gg/3DTNcHu) is still around.

## Google Play and F-Droid

Nori is available from the Google Play Store, and can be downloaded [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.github.tjg1.nori).

It's also available from [F-Droid](https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=io.github.tjg1.nori), the Free and Open Source Android App Repository.

## Donations

If you would like to help keep Nori free (and free of ads) by supporting its continued development, you can make a one-off donation to my [PayPal account](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FSVJZBNKMVZ9J).

name: The "Hey I Finally Got Around to Fixing This Thing" Release
body:
This release fixes the bug with images from Danbooru not displaying correctly, due to their API switching from returning relative URLs to absolute URLs.

## Changelog ##

```
Lesquivemeau (1):
      Updated fr (French) translation

Tomasz Jan GÃ³ralczyk (5):
      Build using updated SDKs
      Handle Danbooru absolute image URLs
      Disable tests failing due to missing API endpoints

```

## Discord server

If you're interested in contributing to Nori, have any questions or just want to hang out, join us on the official [Discord server](https://discord.gg/3DTNcHu).

It's also available from [F-Droid](https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=io.github.tjg1.nori), the Free and Open Source Android App Repository.

Alternatively, you can make a one-off donation to my [PayPal account](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FSVJZBNKMVZ9J).

name: The "Alternative Cure Magical Girl Behoimi-chan" Bugfix Release
body:
This minor release includes a bugfix that sets the Referer header when loading images in ImageViewerActivity - fixing support for sites with hot link protection. It should have been included in 2017.06. Oops.

## Changelog ##

name: The "TransactionSmallEnough" Bugfix Release
body:
This bugfix release introduces a temporary fix for the TransactionTooLarge crash (aka issue #108) that has been plaguing the previous release, until we can work on a more permanent solution.

The only caveat is that you're no longer guaranteed to see the same search results when SearchActivity's instance state is restored, if the API client returns an updated result - i.e. if new images were uploaded.

A larger, regularly scheduled release is coming at the end of this month.

## New in this release ##

- Updated builds tools.
- Fix for the TransactionTooLarge issue causing crashes in SearchActivity

## Changelog ##

```
Tomasz Jan GÃ³ralczyk (3):
      Update buildtools
      Don't save SearchResults to SearchResultGridFragment's instance state
```

## Google Play and F-Droid

Nori is available from the Google Play Store, and can be downloaded [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.github.tjg1.nori).

It's also available from [F-Droid](https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=io.github.tjg1.nori), the Free and Open Source Android App Repository.

name: The "Spring" Release
body:
This release introduces some development quality-of-life changes and fixes support for services that have been previously broken due to a bug in the handling of relative schema URLs.

## New in this release ##

- Continuous integration support via Travis CI (automated test builds)
- Faster compile times
- Fix a bug in the handling of relative schema URLs
- Fix TLS support on older versions of Android
- ACRA crash reporting (users can choose to submit a crash report when Nori crashes)

## Changelog ##

```
particularCircumstances (1):
    - Fix parsing relative URLs for boards hosted outside root path

Tomasz Jan GÃ³ralczyk (5):
    - Replace Norilib submodule with Git subtree
    - Travis CI integration
    - Increase Gradle's heap size to speed up build times
    - Downgrade ion to fix TLS issues on older versions of Android
    - Implement ACRA crash reporting

Lonami (1):
    - Handle more "relative url" cases on normalizeUrl()

Poussinou (1):
- Add download image buttons to README.md
```

## Google Play and F-Droid

Nori is available from the Google Play Store, and can be downloaded [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.github.tjg1.nori).

It's also available from [F-Droid](https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=io.github.tjg1.nori), the Free and Open Source Android App Repository.

## Donations

If you would like to help keep Nori free (and free of ads) by supporting its continued development, you can do so by making a monthly pledge to [my Patreon account](https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3696048). 

Alternatively, you can make a one-off donation to my [PayPal account](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FSVJZBNKMVZ9J).

name: The "Interpolated" Release
body:
This is a bug fix release for things that had to be fixed before work can get underway on the next generation of Norilib.

## New in this release
- Improved scaling quality in ImageViewerActivity (at the cost of memory usage increase)
- Fixed infinite error dialog loop when a video file fails to load
- GIF images are no longer preloaded before being swiped into view
- Progress bars to indicate image loading progress
- An error message is displayed when an image fails to load
- Various refactoring and code quality fixes

## Changelog

```
Tomasz Jan GÃ³ralczyk (15 commits):
      Move adapters into a separate package
      Add ProgressBar to RemoteImageFragment
      Replace app:theme with android:theme
      Image loading error messages
      Defer loading GIFs until the RemoveImageFragment is active
      Use Image#getFileExtension() in ImagePagerAdapter
      Organise code into custom folding regions
      Disable DeepZoom due to scaling issues
      VideoPlayerFragment: Fix dialog loop

myozka (6 commits):
      Refactor Activities by moving inner Adapters into their own class files
```

## Google Play and F-Droid

Nori is available from the Google Play Store, and can be downloaded [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.github.tjg1.nori).

It's also available from [F-Droid](https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=io.github.tjg1.nori), the Free and Open Source Android App Repository.

## Donations

If you would like to help keep Nori free (and free of ads) by supporting its continued development, you can do so by making a monthly pledge to [my Patreon account](https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3696048). 

Alternatively, you can make a one-off donation to my [PayPal account](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FSVJZBNKMVZ9J).

name: The "35mm" Release
body:
This is the first release since `1.x.x` that has been published on the Google Play Store. I'd like to thank all the people who supported me along the way, as I worked tirelessly to make sure that this version of Nori fully complies with the Google Developer Content Policy. And for those of you who stuck around all the way since `2.0.0-RC2` two years ago - thank you for your patience and sorry about the wait.

There were some breaking API changes made to Norilib caused by the switch from okHTTP to Ion as the HTTP client library. You now need to pass a valid `Context` when instantiating a `SearchClient` using `SearchClient.Settings#createSearchClient()`. Enumeration constants related to API types and the adult image filter were also slightly renamed.

I've decided that the best way to move the project forward is to turn Nori into a general-purpose image search engine client. As such, Flickr has replaced Safebooru as the default service, and support for more API types (like Reddit) is on the way. The next release will introduce a redesign of the API Setting dialog to make adding such sites easier without having to manually type the URL.

Also included are new "Material Design" user interface and icons.

[Screenshot](https://my.mixtape.moe/rbcvpu.jpg)

## Changelog

```
Tomasz Jan GÃ³ralczyk (46 commits):
      Create Google Play build flavor
      Add E926 support
      Fix ISO8601 datetime parsing
      Add Play Store donation support
      Launch APISettingsActivity when no services are configured
      Add about dialog
      Update Gradle plugin
      ProGuard obfuscation
      Rename APIType enum values
      Hash hardcoded service URLs
      Replace okHTTP with koush/ion
      Default "Conserve Bandwidth" to true
      WebM support via VideoView
      Add Flickr to service completion
      Replace Toasts with Snackbars
      Material Redesign + updated icons
      Use AppBarLayouts
      Replace spinning ProgressBars with horizontal ones
      Reformat code
      Use Flickr as the default API in all product flavors
      Fix donation amount display
```

## Google Play and F-Droid

Nori is available from the Google Play Store, and can be downloaded [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=io.github.tjg1.nori).

It's also available from [F-Droid](https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=io.github.tjg1.nori), the Free and Open Source Android App Repository.

## Donations

If you would like to help keep Nori free (and free of ads) by supporting its continued development, you can do so by making a monthly pledge to [my Patreon account](https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3696048). 

Alternatively, you can make a one-off donation to my [PayPal account](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FSVJZBNKMVZ9J).

name: The "It Doesn't Crash Anymore When You Do That" Release
body:
This release fixes multiple bugs in Nori, including the TransactionTooLargeException bug. 

Work is still underway to produce a version of Nori that can be published on the Google Play Store without violating the Developer Content Policy.

## Changelog

```
Lewis White (1 commit):
      New Launcher Icon

Tomasz Jan GÃ³ralczyk (29 commits):
      Don't use implicit locales
      Update norilib
      Do not append Git revision to release builds
      Don't pass entire SearchResults to ImageViewerActivity
      Generate assets for the new launcher icon
      Add donation Activity
      Add periodical donate dialog
      Use FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK when starting SearchActivity
      Fit images to screen on high-dpi devices.
      Add link to APISettingsActivity to service spinner
      Dismiss TagListDialogFragment after selecting a tag
      Fix crash when monkeytesting ImageViewerActivity
      Make ImageViewerActivity ViewPager background black
```

## F-Droid

You can download Nori from F-Droid (the Free and Open Source Android App Repository) [here](https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=io.github.tjg1.nori).

## Donations

If you would like to help keep Nori free (and free of ads) by supporting its continued development, you can do so by making a monthly pledge to [my Patreon account](https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3696048). 

Alternatively, you can make a one-off donation to my [PayPal account](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FSVJZBNKMVZ9J).

name: The 'It Should Have Been Ready 2 Years Ago' Release
body:
This is most likely the last release before I start working on getting Nori back on the Play Store.

It fixes all the big bugs in the previous (`v2.0.0-RC2`) release and makes it possible to build Nori with the latest version of the Android SDK (Marshmallow).

## Changelog

```
Tomasz Jan GÃ³ralczyk (31 commits):
      Fix build with API 24
      Change the minimum version Nori is compatible with to API 16 (Jelly Bean)
      Replace TouchImageView with ImageViewZoom
      Change package name to io.github.tjg1.nori
      Fix crashes when restoring state of suspended activities
      Update dependencies
      Switch license to GNU GPLv2
      Fix resource leak in APISettingsDatabase
      Fix lint errors
      Simplify code to accept empty queries in SearchActivity
      Fix Codacy (static code analysis) issues
      Ask for storage permission before downloading images on Android 6.0+
```

## F-Droid

The release will be available on F-Droid, once we sort out the bureaucracy of being added to their automated build system.

## Donations

If you would like to help keep Nori free (and free of ads) by supporting its continued development, you can do so by making a monthly pledge to [my Patreon account](https://www.patreon.com/user?u=3696048). 

Alternatively, you can make a one-off donation to my [PayPal account](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=FSVJZBNKMVZ9J).

name: v1.1.2
body:
- Fix support for *.booru.org sites
- Fix service type detection on ISPs/proxies that insert their own 404 page and override the status code to 200.

name: v1.1.1
body:
Changes:
- Improved memory management
- Danbooru auth made optional

name: v1.1.0
body:
Changes:
- Tag list in image viewer
- Removed grain from activity icon
- Show error drawable when image fails to load
- Improve Danbooru 1.x API support
- Portuguese translation
- Service setting autocomplete

name: 1.0.2 - Bug fixes
body:
Changes since 1.0.0:
- Reduce memory usage in ImageViewerActivity
- Fix NPE when user enters an invalid service URI in ServiceSettingsActivity
